title: Two-Step Verification
enableDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a verification code in addition to your password.
scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
cantScan: Can't scan? Enter this key manually:
enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
saveRecoveryCodes: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. You'll need them if you lose access to your authenticator.
disableWarning: Disabling 2-step verification will make your account less secure.
enterTotpToDisable: Enter verification code from your authenticator app
regenerateWarning: This will invalidate all your existing recovery codes. Make sure to save the new codes.

errors.webAuthnNotSupported: WebAuthn not supported by your browser

passkey.title: Passkeys
passkey.description: Use passkeys to sign in to your account with biometrics or a security key.
passkey.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey? You will no longer be able to use it to sign in.

emailMfaDescription: Receive a verification code via email when signing in
